item.description:
Join RonPaulHQ folks in Ashland for the 4th of July! We'll have two trucks in the parade filled with period-garb-wearing Paul supporters, celebrating the birth of this nation's freedom. More folks are needed to ride in the trucks--and to hand out literature to the local crowd!

If you're willing to ride, email me at mail@ronpaulhq.com, and plan to be at the Ashland Firehouse at 9am. If you're willing to cheer, wear your Paul t-shirt, and hand out campaign literature, meet us in the Ashland state liquor store parking lot at 9:30--we'll give you some handouts and then head on over.
item.name: Ashland 4th of July Parade
